name: Steam Eagles
description:
A Short prototype of a puzzle platformer.

Aboard The Captain's flying airship, you and your friend play as the Transporter and Builder.  Explore the ship's interior as you figure out how to fix the puzzles in each stage.

How to play:

The Goal is to build blocks in a correct placement, which will then complete the level.

Controls

Transporter (First Player):

Movement: WASD

Interaction: E

Ability: Q

Can make static blocks dynamic, pick up and throw blocks, aims with mouse.

Builder (Second Player):

Movement: Arrow keys

Interaction: I

Ability: P

Builds blocks with mouse if collected any dynamic block

Was possible thanks to:

Demil, Tyrannic, りコ, Kaaeden, Marcherin, See, Sljeandell, Soundchemistry, Hamid
